comments: I have been buying from Cloudtail for a long time, this order of "Nivea Nourishing Lotion Body Milk with Deep Moisture Serum and 2x Almond Oil for Very Dry Skin, 400ml" though was a nasty product - there has been clear tampering with the product. I've been using Nivea for several years and this one reeked of chemicals. Not sure if it was a manufacturing defect and it was tampered with. Smelt horrible :(

Smells foul (acidic) . I earlier also had purchased many times from Amazon . And I generally purchase in advance . After 20 days of receiving it  Once I opened and started using  , I found it smelling foul and on using it caused rashes . Probably the old or defective or counterfeit one

I like the soft feel of the lotion on my skin. But dont apply on face or where the skin area sweat a lot. Because it contains a silicon compound that seal the pores of skin. Good delivery and good packaging.

It was awesome because it's of Nivea company and the best part is that it's last for at least 24 hours in its most was the skin comparing to another company creams it is is very very suitable to our skin

review_title: Not original product. Bcz earlier i bought tjis one dint come with any packing..
comments: The same nivea body lotion which i have is totally different... The one which i have is really nice only apply once n forget for the whole day and evrn two if i dont take bath incase ( i have dry and itchy skin specially during winters).. But this one is like any other normal body lotion had to apply twice in a just 6 hrs gap...vrry disappointed. I guess its not original product...
Nivea is perfect nourishing lotion in winter..having good smell n smooth feel...

I am using this lotion for last two years  from local stores and the quality is excellent.This time purchased it through amazon and the quality of lotion is not upto the mark. Even smell is also slightly different. No serum effect, not lasting and no good feel like one uses from local store. But, the container looks original and you will not find any difference in looks/getup of the product packaging/container  unless using the lotion.  This is either duplicate or separately manufactured product for amazon sale only
So, better spent 60/70 bucks more and get the original from stores.

I have extremely dry skin and this works well for me in the summer months. Other lotions are too light an doesn't provide enough moisturisation. THe Pump is also nice since it can be closed off as well. Update - I’m using it during the winter too and it not only moisturises my skin but softens it too over time. Love it. No scent and gets absorbed fast.
Have a doubts it's original or not

This product was not worth my money... I love to use nivea products and I use nivea since my childhood... I have a very sensitive as well as dry skin... Reading it's reviews and ratings i thought to give it a try as it promises deep nourishment and moisturizing for skin... But it doesn't lasts long... It's not that moisturizing and it's scent is medicinal.. didn't like it at all... (I have migraine)... But I purchased another body lotion of nivea of shea butter... I loved it overall... I will not purchase this one again but will purchase shea butter one again definitely... I love Nivea... This review was just based on my specific skin type and preference... Maybe other people will love it... I didn't experienced any side effects... Nor did my skin quality faced any adverse effect...
Awesome product it's as i get from local shops so don't worry about getting duplicates. Worked well and still working. Only for body don't use it in face. I'm happy with this product 😍😍

Got it for ₹200 as an Amazon Lighting Deal! It is super absorbent and moisture lasts well enough too. I bought the Vaseline body lotion too, which is oily in consistency but stays and keep skin moisturised longer. If you like super absorbent and long lasting lotion, Nivea is the way to go!!
Seasonal product

review_title: Best winter cream for full body
comments: My first choice of winter cream is Nivea Body lotion. My skin glowing and shining. Use it daily for best result.

review_title: Part and parcel of winter skin care routine
comments: This is my saviour during winters. It moisturises my extremely dry, itchy skin well and keeps it hydrated for approximately 7-8 hours. Its consistency is amazing, thick yet not greasy and it's like a body butter, just at a cheaper price.

review_title: Moisturises quiet well completely eradicates skin dryness.
comments: Moisturises quiet well completely eradicates skin dryness . Have been using it for about a month and no sign of stickyness/oiliness and also gets absorbed by the skin quite fast

I loooooove this lotion. I have a super dry skin. If i even scratch my skin to test it during summer, white patch comes up due to the dryness. So, this was perfect for me. In fact, I have even applied it at 9 in the morning and checked my skin at 5 in the evening, and there was no sign of dryness. Super long stay product. Very light, non sticky formula. During winters I mix glycerin to this and use it - really works wonders. And the scent is super nice too :)
The product is genuine as ..this is the hot topic on cosmetics...spec. wrt to genuinity..this one is..
The product is as expected...very good for skin for daily purpose  spec..in harsh and dry winters..protection for long hours..(just give it 10-15 min..to get soaked on skin..)
So far the best moisturisers availabile in the market! i hav been using it for 8 yrs now nd i intend to continue it forver!.best for dry nd very dry skin..
Unlike Dove and Vaseline,it is extremely non sticky and non greasy!last easily for 24 hours!

review_title: Nice product at a best price
comments: Once applied You can forget about it!

It is suitable for very dry skin and is intense in real sense. My husband uses it on daily basis and this one is his 3rd bottle. He is a strongest critique of skincare products, so, him liking this to that extent is surely something worth mentioning for me.

review_title: Got 200ml of it for Rs. 143. It ...
comments: Buy it . It's always cheaper than offline market
Product is sealed and recent manufactured so no complaints about that
Packing was also good
And as prime delivery it was very quick

The formula is rich creamy and not that sticky. But it doesn't stay that long. Has a good pleasing smell. But it's better than other moisturizers in this price range. Offers more quantity at reasonable price and does a good job.

review_title: Review of Nivea Nourishing Lotion Body Milk with 2x Almond Oil - 400ml
comments: Got 200ml of it for Rs. 143.
The original product is very good, however i have doubt in amazon sometimes you do not get original product, product is too liquidity and not at all giving result like store bought original product
Best lotion i have ever used. Im using nivea for the first time.Its the best for the people with dry skin like me. It really moisturizes my skin. After applying my is very soft and im loving it

Lotion. Is good with nice fragrance, but not useful for very dry skin. At most it is useful for just dry skin, never for very dry skin. Skin turns back to dry with in 3 4 hrs after application. Product delivery and packing was excellent

Wow..this is a great product by Nivea..it moisturizes the skin all over the day.I've bought Nivea "Shea butter" before..but comparitively it is better than that & for those who has very dry skin it will be a perfect product & surely will be very helpful for their skin.
The moisturizeris really soft and feels good while applying. very mild scent and my skin loves it . Better than other mosturisers i have tried

I have been using this lotion for more than two years. Highly satisfied. For all those having  very  dry skin, it is a must buy product.  It moisturises skin and reduce it dryness.  If you buy from normal shop they charge you 349 RS but here in amazon I got it for RS 255.  Overall my rating is 5/5 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

review_title: Not very effective for dry skin or in winter's
comments: It was not effective on very dry skin. not able.to moisturize for very long g time . Had to take lot of amount to hydrate the skin but after one hour again skin gets dry

review_title: Very nice than any other body brand lotion
comments: Very nice , u can also use it on face , it doesn't look like oily, got so smooth skin.
Very nice Nivea creme. Goes for entire day with a single use. Gives a nice scent with luxurious feeling.

review_title: non greasy perfect solution for dry skin
comments: After trying different brands I finally decided to stick with Nivea. Perfect for winter to avoid dry / itchy skin issues

review_title: Not Appropriate for very dry skin
comments: This lotion is really very thick but it's not stay above 2hours,so,it's not appropriate for very dry skin

review_title: Good Moisturizer among many in the market
comments: I randomly bought it. I was using a different brand regularly but once I could not find the stock in the shelf, i bought NIVEA. I liked it immensely and shifted from the earlier reputed brand to Nivia. I am regularly using since an year and find it extremely satisfying for extra dry skin, as is my case.
The product is good but The nozzle was broken, sellers are requested to check before packing. I managed by attaching the top nozzle of my previous Nivea bottle

review_title: Best lotion for very dry skin
comments: I have tried almost all product for dry skin but didn't work.... Now I am using this product for past 5 years or more and fully satisfied. Go for it if u have dry skin.
Really a nice product from Nivea and love to use it.  Quality is really worth praising. But to my surprise it is available in retail outlet offer buy 1 get 1 @₹220/-

Product is good. Been using Johnson's baby lotion for quite sometime tried Nivea for first time and its equally good.
